item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Of course you're absolutely right Bill. You just send us down your politicians to screw everything up, then demand devolution. <grumble> <grumble> <bah humbug>! <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif"</a>> </p>
item.content:encoded: Of course you’re absolutely right Bill. You just send us down your politicians to screw everything up, then demand devolution. <grumble> <grumble> <bah humbug>! http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLU/$FILE/wink.gif“>

item.title: By: Wild Bill
item.dc:creator: Wild Bill
item.description: <p>*cough* - by "this country", you mean Englandshire.. </p><p>Us jocks of course sorted this out a long long time ago. Hence the reason we're running your country.. <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>></p><p>---* Bill "Scotia Nostra" Buchan...</p>
item.content:encoded:
*cough* – by “this country”, you mean Englandshire..

Us jocks of course sorted this out a long long time ago. Hence the reason we’re running your country.. http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif“>

—* Bill “Scotia Nostra” Buchan…

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Great news! Yes it's always a real bloody stress in England: everywhere else seems to have got it right, so why can't we? Tsk.</p>
item.content:encoded: Great news! Yes it’s always a real bloody stress in England: everywhere else seems to have got it right, so why can’t we? Tsk.
